name: Out of Hand (itch)
description:
A Global Game Jam game about the player having to master the "ritual" that is the handshake. From birth, to graduation, to your first job, handshakes are THE way to show you mean business!

Controls:  "R" to restart; Spacebar to grab; Shift to speed up; Mouse to move hand; and ESC to regain control of the mouse after each level.
